de.axnsoftware.settings.impl

Class SettingsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.SettingsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISettings

    public final class SettingsImpl
extends Object
implements ISettings
    The final class SettingsImpl models a concrete implementation of the ISettings interface.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Carsten Klein "cklein"

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void discardChanges()
      Discards all pending changes.
      void finalizeChanges()
      Finalizes all pending changes but does not store them permanently.
      Boolean getHasPendingChanges()
      Returns whether there are any pending changes which either need to be finalized or discarded.

      Returns an instance of the registered type.
      ISettingsStore getStore()
      Gets the underlying store.
      Class<?> getType()
      Returns the type registered with the underlying ISettingsStore.
      void setProperties(Object properties)
      Sets the properties but does not finalize them.

      • discardChanges

        public void discardChanges()
        Discards all pending changes.
        Specified by:
        discardChanges in interface ISettings

      • finalizeChanges

        public void finalizeChanges()
        Finalizes all pending changes but does not store them permanently. In order for the settings to be permanently stored, one must call ISettingsStore#storeProperties().
        Specified by:
        finalizeChanges in interface ISettings

      • getHasPendingChanges

        public Boolean getHasPendingChanges()
        Returns whether there are any pending changes which either need to be finalized or discarded.
        Specified by:
        getHasPendingChanges in interface ISettings
        Returns:
        true whether there are any pending changes

        Returns an instance of the registered type.

        Returns:
        the properties

        Gets the underlying store.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the underlying store

      • getType

        public Class<?> getType()
        Returns the type registered with the underlying ISettingsStore.
        Specified by:
        getType in interface ISettings
        Returns:

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Object properties)
        Sets the properties but does not finalize them. properties must be an instance of the registered type.
        Specified by:
        setProperties in interface ISettings
